title: Never got Draven Icon after Draven day
body: After I rushed over to a store to get RP because I got Pulsefire Ezreal from a free hextech chest on the first day of "DRAAAAAVEEENN DAY". I bought Infernal Nasus with the left over RP, and got Lolipoppy from the Draven Spinning Axes, once i got enough essence to get  Pulsefire Ezreal I got Arctic Warfare Caitlyn from another Dravens Spinning Axes. Now, I only did this, because I really like Draven and really wanted that summoner icon. BUT, Its now April 15, and I still have not got the summoner icon. What's up with that? {{champion:119}}

replies.body:
The icons will be distributed in waves and should be finished by the 25th.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210014153--April-14-Draven-Day-icons-will-be-distributed-to-accounts-by-April-25-
Yup, we're still handing them out. :)
All of the icons for Draven Day should be distributed by the 25th. If at that time you still do not have the rewards you earned, *then* you can submit a support ticket.
